content: 2 ws sl 1 p7 p2tog p1 turn row 1 k1tbl p1 row 3 rs sl 1 knit to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat cuff rib row 1 for 1 inch/ 2 5 cm row 4 ws sl 1 purl to 1 st before gap leg p2tog p1 turn work row 1 of array chart or written repeat row 3 and 4 until 18 20 22 sts instructions 3 4 4 times over 56 64 72 sts remain switch to main color knit as established continuing chart row gusset 2-8 repeat row 1-8 until desired length of leg stop 2 0 2 sts before bor mark row k 9 10 11 sts this position is the new you have stopped on your chart proceed to beginning of the round bor in the middle of the heel place a special bor marker dividing sts for heel flap setup round 1 k across the 9 10 11 heel flap remaining heel sts then pick up and knit 12 14 18 sts in edge of heel flap place divide sts as follows k 1 0 1 p 1 0 1 marker work next row of array chart or written k 1 0 1 p 1 0 1 work next row of array instructions 3 4 4 times over 24 32 32 sts k 2 0 2 and the remaining 28 32 36 sts chart or written instructions 3 4 4 times are for the heel flap over 24 32 32 sts k 2 0 2 switch to cc 50 yard skein k 1 row p 1 place marker pick up and knit 12 14 18 sts row this makes a nice clean line for the in edge of heel flap k across 9 10 11 sts heel 70 80 94 sts row 1 rs sl 1 k1 14 16 18 times gusset decreases row 2 ws sl 1 purl to end of row round 1 k until 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 slip marker work as established over top of foot slip marker k1 ssk k until end of round round 2 k until marker slip marker work as established over top of foot slip marker k until end of round repeat the last 2 rounds until 56 64 72 sts remain foot of sock k until marker slip marker work as established over top of foot slip marker k until end of round knit as established repeating row 1-8 of chart or written instructions until desired length or 1 5 inches / 3 8 cm from finished finishing length graft 20 20 26 sts sts together using your toe preferred grafting technique or as follows kitchener for knit/ stockinette decrease round k until 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 slip marker k1 ssk k until 3 sts front needle insert tapestry needle knitwise before marker k2tog k1 slip marker k1 drop the stitch ssk k until end of round front needle insert tapestry needle purlwise next round knit
